程序包 eu.andredick.tools

类 SCPExactSolver

java.lang.Object
eu.andredick.tools.SCPExactSolver
public class SCPExactSolver extends Object
Google Or Tools 库的包装类, 精确解决 SCP 实例.

“Google Or Tools”必须集成为一个软件包. https://developers.google.com/optimization/
